item.title: Aspose.Email | Java Class Library to Process Outlook Formats
item.description: Java Email API Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Email for Java is a complete set of Email Processing APIs to create, read and manipulate emails from within your applications. It makes it easier to work with many Outlook email message formats such as MSG, EML, EMLX and MHT files without the need of installing Microsoft Outlook.

item.title: Aspose.Words | Java Library to Process Document Formats
item.description: Java API for Various Document Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Words for Java is an advanced Java Word processing API that enables you to perform a great range of document processing tasks directly within your Java applications. Aspose.Words for Java API supports processing word (DOC, DOCX, OOXML, RTF) HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, EPUB, XPS, SWF and all image formats.

item.title: Citation Styles & Bibliography Styles API | Download C# DLL
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 23.8 (DLLs only) Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 90.5MB Date Added: 6/8/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-words-for-net-23-8-release-notes/ DescriptionThis ZIP file contains the Aspose.Words for .NET and .NET Standard 2.0 assemblies. The assemblies are the same as in the MSI installer of the product of the same version. Download this if you want to use Aspose.Words without the MSI installer, for example because you cannot run MSI installers on Mono.

item.title: Citation Styles & Bibliography Styles API Support | C# Apps
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 23.8 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 90.47MB Date Added: 6/8/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-words-for-net-23-8-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Words for .NET 23.8 MSI installer. File Details Citation and Bibliography Field Support The Document.UpdateFields, Range.UpdateFields or Field.Update methods can be used to update the newly introduced CITATION and BIBLIOGRAPHY fields. Seamlessly integrate citation and bibliography fields into your documents to enhance the end-user experience of your academic writing and referencing Apps.

item.title: Aspose.Words 23.8 | Process Document Formats via Java API
item.description: Java API for Various Document Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Words for Java is an advanced Java Word processing API that enables you to perform a great range of document processing tasks directly within your Java applications. Aspose.Words for Java API supports processing word (DOC, DOCX, OOXML, RTF) HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, EPUB, XPS, SWF and all image formats.
